text: You can click here to access your dashboard.
Your dashboard gives you access to statistics and gives you advices to annotate your database.
This bar help you finding and select subset of planes for visualization or processing.
This button displayes the syntax used by the advanced query.
These buttons are your 'View Buttons'. Views help you going through your database by different ways.
This  button activates the 'Icon View'. It gives a folder/file representation of your database according to the Plane Organisation.
The 'Table View' shows your planes in a table
The 'Single Plane View' helps you  check your database plane by plane with a bigger display.
